name: Chipotle Chicken Sandwich
author: Chris Elmore
summary: This chicken sandwich has a nice kick to it!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon canned chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, seeded and minced
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and pan-fry chicken breasts until browned and no longer pink inside, about 10 minutes per side
Sprinkle chicken breasts with red wine vinegar, lime juice, sugar, salt, black pepper, 1 chopped green onion, garlic, and oregano; pan-fry until green onion is soft, an additional 5 minutes per side
Transfer chicken breasts to a plate and keep warm
Place light mayonnaise and chipotle pepper into a blender and blend until smooth
Transfer to a bowl and stir in 1 1/2 tablespoon of chopped green onion and sweet pickle relish
Layer 4 bread slices each with 1/4 cup of lettuce, a chicken breast, and 1 mozzarella cheese slice
Spread remaining slices with chipotle mayonnaise and place on top to make sandwiches
